data.comment: The match has started at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes are coming forward and Ricardo Quaresma gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the away team in Guimaraes.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Helder Malheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Guimaraes are pushing forward but Mikel Agu's finish is wide of the goal.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 8, Helder Malheiro awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, In Guimaraes Guimaraes attack through Marcus Edwards. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
In Guimaraes Pacos Ferreira's Luther Singh is caught offside.
In the minute 16, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Guimaraes.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marcelo for Pacos Ferreira who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Guimaraes are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 21, Guimaraes's Bruno Duarte attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Marcelo is back on the pitch.
In the minute 23, Helder Malheiro blows against Pacos Ferreira's Luther Singh for offside.
In Guimaraes, Douglas Tanque of Pacos Ferreira is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 26, Pacos Ferreira surge into the attack at Dom Afonso Henriques but Marceloâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
Throw-in Guimaraes.
In the minute 29, Helder Malheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Nicolas Janvier is on a sub for Pepelu for Guimaraes.
Helder Malheiro signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
In the minute 33, Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Guimaraes.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira's Luther Singh breaks free at Dom Afonso Henriques. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Helder Malheiro awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Pacos Ferreira's Oleg Reabciuk gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Guimaraes defender.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In Guimaraes, Marco Baixinho (Pacos Ferreira) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 39, Bruno Costa of Pacos Ferreira smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
In the minute 41, Bruno Costa for Pacos Ferreira gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Luiz Carlos for Pacos Ferreira drives towards goal at Dom Afonso Henriques. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Douglas Tanque (Pacos Ferreira) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 45, At Dom Afonso Henriques the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Bruno Duarte for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Guimaraes.
Pacos Ferreira's Douglas Tanque misses with an attempt on goal.
Helder Malheiro awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Guimaraes capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 50, Guimaraes's Ricardo Quaresma gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 51, Luiz Carlos (Pacos Ferreira) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
Helder Malheiro signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Pacos Ferreira's Douglas Tanque is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 54, Luiz Carlos of Pacos Ferreira is pulled up for offside.
In Guimaraes Pacos Ferreira attack through Luther Singh. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 58, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
Can Guimaraes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Guimaraes make their second substitution with Rochinha replacing Marcus Edwards.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Important block from the Pacos Ferreira defence as Ricardo Quaresma fires in a strike for Guimaraes.
Attention is being given to Pacos Ferreiraâ€™s Stephen Eustaquio and play has been suspended briefly.
Stephen Eustaquio for Pacos Ferreira is back on the field again.
In the minute 66, Helder Ferreira is replacing Lucas Silva for the away team.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
In the minute 67, Marcelo for Pacos Ferreira has been booked by Helder Malheiro and receives a first yellow card.
Jorge Fernandes (Guimaraes) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Pacos Ferreira drives forward and Luiz Carlos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 72, Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Helder Malheiro awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Guimaraes drive forward but Bruno Duarte is judged offside.
In the minute 73, Pepa is making the team's second substitution at Dom Afonso Henriques with Martin Calderon replacing Luiz Carlos.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Easah Suliman (Guimaraes) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Helder Malheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Ricardo Quaresma (Guimaraes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
In the minute 79, Pacos Ferreira pushes forward through Bruno Costa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Guimaraes.
Silvio is booked for the home team.
In the minute 80, Martin Calderon of Pacos Ferreira gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Penalty! Helder Malheiro points to the spot, great chance for Guimaraes...
In the minute 83, Goal! Guimaraes take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Andre Andre spot-kick..
Pacos Ferreira attack but Martin Calderon's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Luther Singh of Pacos Ferreira smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Free kick in a good position for Guimaraes!
The away team replace Bruno Costa with Joao Pedro.
Bruno Duarte (Guimaraes) has received a yellow card from Helder Malheiro.
In the minute 87, The home team have replaced Bruno Duarte with Noah Jean Holm. This is the third substitution made today by Tiago.
Guimaraes's Andre Andre misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Tiago (Guimaraes) is making a fourth substitution, with Andre Almeida replacing Ricardo Quaresma.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
At Dom Afonso Henriques, Bruno Varela has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Pacos Ferreira's Marco Baixinho has been booked in Guimaraes.
